title: League Launcher keeps crashing
body:
So as I stated above, the Launcher keeps crashing.

I'll give you a play by play to make it crystal clear.

Click on Lol.launcher.exe.
League of Legends Logo flashes for up to a few seconds.
Nothing else happens.

I've restarted my computer,,

Thanks for the help in advance.

replies.body:
Hey there,

Could you please download the [HRT (Hextech Repair Tool)](https://s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/player-support/tools/Hextech%20Repair%20Tool.msi), run it with the default settings.

A file should be saved to your desktop called LoL-Logs.zip, please upload this file somewhere and reply with a link.
